# configure scl in suse 

```{r,eval=F}

cd ~/usr/src

wget https://github.com/servo/nspr/archive/master.zip
wget https://github.com/servo/nss/archive/master.zip

./configure  --prefix=/home/ing/chen.zhao/usr/ 

wget https://github.com/sclorg/scl-utils/archive/scl-1.zip
unzip scl-1
make 
cp scl ~/usr/bin
wget http://ftp.rpm.org/releases/rpm-4.6.x/rpm-4.6.0.tar.bz2
tar jxf rpm-4.6.0.tar.bz2
cd ~/usr/src/rpm-4.6.0
export C_INCLUDE_PATH=/home/ing/chen.zhao/usr/include/
CXXFLAGS=-I/home/ing/chen.zhao/usr/include/nspr CXXFLAGS=-I/home/ing/chen.zhao/usr/include/nspr CFLAGS=-I/home/ing/chen.zhao/usr/include/nspr ./configure  --prefix=/home/ing/
chen.zhao/usr/ 


mkdir rpms
cd rpms
wget -np -r https://people.centos.org/tru/devtools-2/6/x86_64/RPMS/
rpm -ivh --relocate /=/home/ing/chen.zhao/chroot people.centos.org/tru/devtools-2/6/x86_64/RPMS/devtoolset-2-gcc-4.8.2-15.el6.x86_64.rpm

```
